I'm full now..."},{"lineNumber":246098,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ふへへ、むにゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe, mmm...\""},{"lineNumber":246099,"originalJapaneseLine":"顔面の左半分に大きなアザを作り、","translatedEnglishLine":"With a large bruise on the left half of his face,"},{"lineNumber":246100,"originalJapaneseLine":"鼻が折れたのか、大量の鼻血を流しながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"and possibly a broken nose, bleeding heavily from it,"},{"lineNumber":246101,"originalJapaneseLine":"寝ている兵は幸せそうに寝言を漏らした。","translatedEnglishLine":"the sleeping soldier mumbled happily in his sleep."},{"lineNumber":246102,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、あ？　――なに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, huh? — What?\""},{"lineNumber":246103,"originalJapaneseLine":"ことここに至り、男は異常に気づく。","translatedEnglishLine":"At this point, the man realized something was wrong."},{"lineNumber":246104,"originalJapaneseLine":"表情が徐々に焦りに彩られていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"His expression gradually filled with panic."},{"lineNumber":246105,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、こいつら、いったい……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-What the hell are these guys...?"},{"lineNumber":246106,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうなってやがるんだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"What on earth is going on...?\""},{"lineNumber":246107,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おんやぁ〜？　起きている奴がいるじゃないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh ho~? There's someone awake after all.\""},{"lineNumber":246108,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ、魔物兵だと！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-What, a monster soldier!?\""},{"lineNumber":246109,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーっと、動くなよ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, don't move,"},{"lineNumber":246110,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうすりゃ痛い目見ずに済む」","translatedEnglishLine":"if you do, you won't get hurt.\""},{"lineNumber":246111,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ、馬鹿だな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah, how foolish...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 溜め息をつきながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sighing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドカッと椅子に腰を下ろすと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he plopped down into his chair,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分にも睡魔が襲ってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and drowsiness overcame him too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……しかし、うぅん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... but, hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今夜はなんとも穏やかな夜だ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tonight is such a peaceful night..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても静かだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was very quiet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人の声はもちろん、鳥の声すら聞こえない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not a human voice, nor even birdsong could be heard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全ての生物が眠ってしまったような穏やかさ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A calmness as if all living things had fallen asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頬を撫でる湿り気を帯びた生ぬるい風は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The damp lukewarm breeze brushing his cheek

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこか甘い匂いを伴っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: brought with it a somewhat sweet scent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 月ですら眠りに落ちそうなほど、暖かい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was so warm even the moon seemed about to fall asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （こんな夜は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (On nights like this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物も静かにしてるのかね……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even the monsters must be quiet...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ああ……いかんいかん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Ah... no, no...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺まで眠ってしまいそうだ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I myself am about to fall asleep...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ちゃんと……起きて……いない……と……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I must... stay awake...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで落っこちるように……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if falling down...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自然と見張り兵士の意識が途切れ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the sentry's consciousness naturally slipped away,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穏やかな顔で眠りにつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he fell asleep with a peaceful expression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大で無骨な砦に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Within the huge, rugged fortress,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士達の寝息だけが静かに漂っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: only the quiet breathing of the soldiers drifted in the air.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを一人の少女だけが見守っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only one girl was watching over it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだ、これは……！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-What is this...!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌朝、交代に訪れた兵士が砦で見たものは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next morning, the soldier who came on shift saw something in the fortress

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が目を疑う物だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that made him doubt his own eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ZZZ……ZZZ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "ZZZ... ZZZ..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う〜ん、むにゃむにゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh~ mumbles..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい！　お前ら！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey! You guys!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍が攻めてきているんだぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army is attacking!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにをしている！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you doing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頬を叩こうが、耳元で騒ごうが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No matter if he slapped their cheeks or shouted near their ears,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰も彼もがぐっすりと眠っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: everyone was sound asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……昨晩はパーティーでも開いていたのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Were they having a party last night or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん……むにゃむにゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... mumbles..."
"—Ugh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい加減にしろ！　この！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enough already! You lot!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒りがほとばしり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His anger surged,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝ている兵の顔を思い切り踏みつけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he forcefully stepped on a sleeping soldier's face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男は、兵が痛みと衝撃に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The man expected the soldier to spring up in pain and shock.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慌てて飛び起きるのを想像していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He imagined him suddenly waking up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、しかし――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, however—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん……もうお腹いっぱい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... I'm full now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふへへ、むにゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, mmm..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔面の左半分に大きなアザを作り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a large bruise on the left half of his face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鼻が折れたのか、大量の鼻血を流しながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and possibly a broken nose, bleeding heavily from it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝ている兵は幸せそうに寝言を漏らした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the sleeping soldier mumbled happily in his sleep.
"Eh, huh? — What?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ことここに至り、男は異常に気づく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, the man realized something was wrong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 表情が徐々に焦りに彩られていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His expression gradually filled with panic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、こいつら、いったい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-What the hell are these guys...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうなってやがるんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What on earth is going on...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おんやぁ〜？　起きている奴がいるじゃないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh ho~? There's someone awake after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ、魔物兵だと！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-What, a monster soldier!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーっと、動くなよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa, don't move,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうすりゃ痛い目見ずに済む」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if you do, you won't get hurt."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、馬鹿だな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah, how foolish..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 溜め息をつきながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sighing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドカッと椅子に腰を下ろすと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he plopped down into his chair,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分にも睡魔が襲ってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and drowsiness overcame him too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……しかし、うぅん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... but, hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今夜はなんとも穏やかな夜だ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tonight is such a peaceful night..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても静かだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was very quiet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人の声はもちろん、鳥の声すら聞こえない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not a human voice, nor even birdsong could be heard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全ての生物が眠ってしまったような穏やかさ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A calmness as if all living things had fallen asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頬を撫でる湿り気を帯びた生ぬるい風は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The damp lukewarm breeze brushing his cheek

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこか甘い匂いを伴っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: brought with it a somewhat sweet scent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 月ですら眠りに落ちそうなほど、暖かい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was so warm even the moon seemed about to fall asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （こんな夜は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (On nights like this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物も静かにしてるのかね……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even the monsters must be quiet...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ああ……いかんいかん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Ah... no, no...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺まで眠ってしまいそうだ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I myself am about to fall asleep...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ちゃんと……起きて……いない……と……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I must... stay awake...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで落っこちるように……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if falling down...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自然と見張り兵士の意識が途切れ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the sentry's consciousness naturally slipped away,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穏やかな顔で眠りにつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he fell asleep with a peaceful expression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大で無骨な砦に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Within the huge, rugged fortress,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士達の寝息だけが静かに漂っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: only the quiet breathing of the soldiers drifted in the air.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを一人の少女だけが見守っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only one girl was watching over it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだ、これは……！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-What is this...!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌朝、交代に訪れた兵士が砦で見たものは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next morning, the soldier who came on shift saw something in the fortress

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が目を疑う物だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that made him doubt his own eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ZZZ……ZZZ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "ZZZ... ZZZ..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う〜ん、むにゃむにゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh~ mumbles..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい！　お前ら！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey! You guys!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍が攻めてきているんだぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army is attacking!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにをしている！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you doing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頬を叩こうが、耳元で騒ごうが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No matter if he slapped their cheeks or shouted near their ears,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰も彼もがぐっすりと眠っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: everyone was sound asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……昨晩はパーティーでも開いていたのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Were they having a party last night or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん……むにゃむにゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... mumbles..."
"—Ugh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい加減にしろ！　この！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enough already! You lot!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒りがほとばしり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His anger surged,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝ている兵の顔を思い切り踏みつけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he forcefully stepped on a sleeping soldier's face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男は、兵が痛みと衝撃に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The man expected the soldier to spring up in pain and shock.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慌てて飛び起きるのを想像していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He imagined him suddenly waking up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、しかし――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, however—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん……もうお腹いっぱい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... I'm full now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふへへ、むにゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, mmm..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔面の左半分に大きなアザを作り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a large bruise on the left half of his face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鼻が折れたのか、大量の鼻血を流しながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and possibly a broken nose, bleeding heavily from it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝ている兵は幸せそうに寝言を漏らした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the sleeping soldier mumbled happily in his sleep.
"Eh, huh? — What?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ことここに至り、男は異常に気づく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, the man realized something was wrong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 表情が徐々に焦りに彩られていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His expression gradually filled with panic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、こいつら、いったい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-What the hell are these guys...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうなってやがるんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What on earth is going on...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おんやぁ〜？　起きている奴がいるじゃないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh ho~? There's someone awake after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ、魔物兵だと！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-What, a monster soldier!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーっと、動くなよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa, don't move,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうすりゃ痛い目見ずに済む」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if you do, you won't get hurt."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、馬鹿だな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah, how foolish..."
